DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate efficacy Diclofenac Sodium Topical ( DSG ) 1 % compare placebo apply four time day subject acute ankle sprain 'in-use ' condition , particular regard pain relief .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Diclofenac Sodium Topical Gel 1 % Applied 4 Times Daily Subjects With Acute Ankle Sprain
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : 1 . Male female age 18 year . 2 . Acute sprain lateral ankle , Grade III , meet baseline pain intensity level . 3 . Injury within past 12 hour . Exclusion criterion : 1 . Pain medication take within 6 hour precede randomization . 2 . During past 3 month : Grade IIII sprain ankle . 3 . During past 6 month : Grade IIIII sprain , significant injury ( fracture tear ligament ) , surgery ( except skin nail ) ankle foot . 4 . Pain instability ankle attributable previous ankle sprain trauma . 5 . Ankle sprain attributable known disease affect ligament , ligament hyperlaxity due connective tissue disease ( e.g. , Marfan 's syndrome , Down 's syndrome , EhlersDanlos syndrome ) . Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply
